name: Hidden Riddles. The Amazon Mystery
description:
Being a detective is no easy task! But the brave Detective Louis has no fear as he embarks on a journey into the heart of the Amazon jungle to help his client solve a mysterious case!

150 colorful nonogram puzzles with your choice of difficulty, a detective story full of twists and turns, and a pleasant soundtrack have all been crafted for your enjoyment! Challenge yourself and pass some time unraveling mysterious puzzles!

Complete levels, solve puzzles, and follow Detective Louis as he solves the challenging case of the Amazon Mystery!

- 150 vibrant and memorable levels!
- Eye-popping graphical effects!
- A captivating story!
- Colorful scenes straight from the Amazon jungle!
- Flex your mental muscles: train your skills of logic and abstract reasoning!
- Intuitive UI and engaging gameplay!
